## **Thyroid Cancer Prediction**

-   **Description:** A machine learning-based project that achieved **82.45% accuracy** by analyzing the **Thyroid Cancer Risk Prediction Dataset** to predict cancer risk. The dataset consisted of **212,691 records** and **23 attributes**, obtained from Kaggle.\
-   **Technologies Used:** Kaggle, Machine Learning, Data Visualization
